train_booking.tips: Bookings open at 10 AM / 11 AM for Tatkal. Create an account beforehand.

taj_mahal.tips: Select 'Agra Circle' -> 'Taj Mahal'. Foreigners get a separate queue.

kerala_ferry.tips: For tourist boats in Alappuzha, verify schedules here.

andaman_ferry.tips: Tickets usually open 3-4 days in advance. High demand.

statue_of_unity.tips: Viewing Gallery tickets sell out fast. Book 1 week prior.

ksrtc_bus.tips: Best for trips like Bangalore to Mysore/Coorg.

upsrtc_bus.tips: Use the official UPSRTC portal for UP roadways bus services and route information.

tirupati_darshan.tips: Special Entry Darshan (₹300) opens months in advance. Beware of fake sites.

india_evisa.authority: Bureau of Immigration, Ministry of Home Affairs
india_evisa.tips: Apply only on the official portal. Do not use private agents claiming faster approvals.

passport_seva.authority: Passport Seva, Ministry of External Affairs
passport_seva.tips: Book appointments from official Passport Seva only. Keep documents ready before payment.

vaishno_devi_yatra.authority: Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine Board
vaishno_devi_yatra.tips: Yatra registration/RFID is mandatory. Use only Shrine Board website for bookings and services.

amarnath_yatra.tips: Complete health and permit requirements before travel. Register only through SASB channels.

chardham_registration.tips: Register pilgrims in advance and carry QR/registration proof during the journey.

mussoorie_tourist_registration.tips: Use the Tourist Care portal for official registration workflows and local compliance.

trains.tips: The only official site for train bookings. Opens at 8 AM for general quotas.

delhi_metro.tips: Use 'DMRC Travel' app for QR tickets. Smart cards are available at stations.

mumbai_metro_1.tips: Connects Versova-Andheri-Ghatkopar. Distinct from other MMRDA lines.

mumbai_metro_lines.tips: For Lines 2A and 7. Use 'Mumbai 1' App for tickets.

bangalore_metro.tips: Use WhatsApp Chatbot or Namma Metro App for QR tickets to skip queues.

chennai_metro.tips: Tourists can buy a 'Tourist Card' for unlimited rides for 1 day (₹100).

kolkata_metro.tips: India's oldest metro. Smart cards are interoperable on East-West and North-South lines.

hyderabad_metro.tips: Connects Miyapur, LB Nagar, and Hitech City. Use 'TSavaari' App.

kochi_metro.tips: Same card works for Metro Rail and the Water Metro ferries.

up_metros.tips: Single authority for Lucknow, Kanpur, and Agra metros. GoSmart card works.

noida_metro.tips: Requires separate ticket/card from Delhi Metro. Interchange at Sector 51/52.

pune_metro.tips: Two lines operational. Use 'Pune Metro' App for QR tickets.

ahmedabad_metro.tips: Connects Motera Stadium and Vastral. expanding rapidly.

ksrtc_karnataka.tips: Best for Bangalore, Mysore, Coorg, Hampi. 'Ambaari' is the luxury sleeper class.

apsrtc_andhra.authority: Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corp
apsrtc_andhra.tips: Official buses for Tirupati, Vijayawada, and Visakhapatnam.

tsrtc_telangana.tips: Buses from Hyderabad to all districts. 'Garuda' is the premium AC class.

msrtc_maharashtra.tips: Search for 'Shivneri' (Volvo) for Mumbai-Pune-Nasik routes. 'Lal Pari' is the local red bus.

gsrtc_gujarat.tips: Connects Ahmedabad, Surat, Somnath, Dwarka, and Rann of Kutch.

rsrtc_rajasthan.tips: Best for Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur, Jaisalmer. Look for 'Super Luxury' Volvo.

upsrtc_uttar_pradesh.tips: Essential for Agra, Ayodhya, Varanasi, and Kumbh Mela travel.

bsrtc_bihar.tips: Use Bihar Transport's official portal for state transport information and official services.

hrtc_himachal.tips: The lifeline of the mountains. Best for Manali, Shimla, Dharamshala, and Leh.

utc_uttarakhand.tips: Buses to Rishikesh, Haridwar, Nainital, Dehradun, and Char Dham Yatra points.

punjab_roadways.tips: Official booking for Amritsar, Chandigarh, Ludhiana, and Delhi airport Volvo buses.

pepsu_punjab.tips: Serving Patiala, Bathinda, and southern Punjab routes.

haryana_roadways.tips: Known for fast and frequent service to Delhi, Chandigarh, and Gurgaon.

tnstc_tamil_nadu.tips: SETC (State Express) is for long distance (Chennai-Madurai). TNSTC is for shorter inter-city.

kerala_ksrtc.tips: Look for 'K-Swift' or 'Minnal' buses for faster travel. Connects Munnar, Thekkady, Alleppey.

wbtc_west_bengal.tips: For AC Volvos within Kolkata and to Digha/Sundarbans.

nbstc_north_bengal.tips: Essential for travel to Siliguri, Darjeeling, Cooch Behar, and Dooars region.

sbstc_south_bengal.tips: Connects Durgapur, Asansol, Bankura, and Purulia.

osrtc_odisha.tips: Direct buses to Puri (Jagannath Temple), Bhubaneswar, and Cuttack.

astc_assam.tips: Hub for travel in North East India (Guwahati to Shillong, Kaziranga).

jksrtc_kashmir.tips: Official buses for Jammu-Srinagar highway and Srinagar-Leh route.

kadamba_goa.tips: Airport shuttles and inter-city buses connecting Panjim, Margao, and Vasco.

ranthambore_safari.tips: Login via SSO ID is required. Book 90 days in advance.

jim_corbett_safari.tips: Book 'Dhikala' zone for night stays inside the jungle.

gir_safari.tips: The ONLY official site. Beware of fake .com lookalikes.

tadoba_safari.tips: Also covers Pench (MH), Bor, and Melghat reserves.

bandipur_safari.tips: Official portal for safari and cottage booking in Bandipur.

nagarhole_safari.tips: Bookings for Kabini and Veeranahosahalli zones.

lakshadweep_permit.tips: Mandatory for all non-residents to enter the islands.

arunachal_ilp.tips: Inner Line Permit required for all Indian tourists.

sikkim_permits.tips: Apply for Nathula Pass and North Sikkim permits here.
